assertion.label: Change Details
assertion.name: change_details
assertion.value: Since the publication of the article, it has been noted that there is an error in Table 2. Where 543€ is listed in the final column of the table, this should have been written as 550€.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.
